strapiPost.title: Bartleby's Seitan Shop Revolutionizes Plant-Based Meals
strapiPost.content:
Specializing in southern-fried plant-based eats, Bartleby’s Seitan Shop believes better food choices don’t need to be bland or boring.

  • Delicious feast: Seitan is a protein from wheat and has been used for thousands of years. The Bartleby’s food truck is known as the Seitan Stand and is open seven days a week at Bentonville Brewing with delivery and preorder options and some free samples! 
  • Make it at home: There is also a frozen line available at Akin’s in Rogers, Maple Market on Emma in Springdale, and Ozark Natural Foods in Fayetteville. Plus, they ship nationwide. On Bartleby’s food website, you can find recipe ideas, and on their social media, you can find weekly recipe videos. 

Learn more HERE.
